snippet: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel’s decision to review an overturned sexual assault conviction comes amid mounting criticism of the Pentagon’s handling of such cases.
abstract: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel is initiating internal review of decision by senior Air Force commander Lt Gen Craig A Franklin to overturn sexual assault conviction of Air Force fighter pilot Lt Col James Wilkerson.
lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel’s decision to review an overturned sexual assault conviction comes amid mounting criticism of the Pentagon’s handling of such cases.

headline.seo: Hagel to Open Review of Sexual Assault Case
headline.main: Hagel to Open Review of Sexual Assault Case
headline.print_headline: Hagel to Open Review Of Sexual Assault Case
